headline: A Look At J.B. Hunt (JBHT) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: J.B. Hunt Transport Services (JBHT) is back in focus after recent share price moves, with the stock closing at US$206.85. Investors are reassessing what current performance metrics might imply for the business. See our latest analysis for J.B. Hunt Transport Services. The latest move to US$206.85 comes after a 49.76% 90 day share price return, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 20.06% suggests momentum has been building rather than fading.
